timezone.description: The current timezone for the application.

language.description: The default language for the application.

metaKeywords.description: The meta keywords you would like to use for the application.

fromEmailAddress.description: The global from email address. All email from the system will come from this address.

fromEmailName.description: The global from email name. This is the name that will be shown with the fromEmailAddress.

fileUploadAllowableExtensions.description: The allowable extensions for files. I would not suggest putting executable files in here...

headerRowRepeat.description: The number of rows displayed in a table before the header cells are repeated.

requiredAccountFields.description: When a user logs in, if these fields are not populated, they will be forced to populate the fields before continuing (separate by commas)

defaultRole.description: Default role that a user gets if they are not logged in.

newAccountRole.description: Role which is assigned to users when a new account is created for them

allowRemoteAccess.description: If set to 1, allows users to utilize a SOAP interface to access certain functionality of your application.

showTrackbackOnErrors.description: Whether or not to show the trackback of the error

numHoursEvaluationAvailability.description: The numsber of hours an evaluation is available after an event has finished.

numHoursEventCancel.description: The number of hours before an event that a user can cancel their reservation.

fileUploadAllowableExtensions.description: The allowable extensions for files. I would not suggest putting executable files in here...

defaultMinWorkshopSize.description: Default minimum number of attendees for a workshop

defaultWorkshopWaitlistSize.description: Default waitlist size for a workshop

numHoursLowAttendanceNotification.description: The number of hours before a workshop is supposed to start to send a notification if the class size is less than the minimum requirement.

numHoursFirstReminder.description: The number of hours before a workshop is supposed to start to send a first notification of class attendance.

numHoursFinalReminder.description: The number of hours before a workshop is supposed to start to send a final notification of class attendance.

numHoursEvaluationReminder.description: The number of hours after a workshop is supposed to finish to send a reminder to users to fill out the class evaluation. This only applies to users who have not filled out the evaluation already, but were marked as attended.
